post.summary: Request a payment for a return.
post.description: This endpoint requests a payment for a return through the connected payment provider

requestBody.description: The return payment request object to be created.

204.description: The return payment request is created.

403.description: The payment provider does not allow the return payment request to be created.

422.description: This modification is not allowed on this return payment request.

500.description: The payment provider returned an error.
